short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With the AI-powered tool, you can easily remove background from photo, or further replace the transparent backdrop with colors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BG Remover is an AI-powered tool that boosts your efficiency in photo editing. 
In the digital era, individuals have more convenience in photo editing with the help of artificial intelligence. Before, it was challenging for a layman to do background removal by himself because he had to handle sophisticated editing software like Photoshop and carefully pick the tiny pixels to promise a good-looking result. But now, AI tools emerge on the market, you can get a satisfactory result with fool clicks. Take background removal as an example. Powerful AI tools can automatically remove background from image.
Our BG Remover boasts a trustworthy AI tool. When processing the image you upload, it can intelligently separate the foreground from the background and then remove the background. Its AI technology promises the final precise result, getting rid of sticky edges or background remains. A much better result than that comes from your conscientious manual processing.
Besides that, we also support some simple photo editing features like background change, restore/remover, and resize. After you get the transparent background, you can continue to remove unwanted areas or restore pixels. Change the background with color templates......

üéÅ What can it do?
- Remove background with AI technology
- Replace background with colors
- Resize photos with custom sizes or preset sizes for different platforms

Key features:
ü§ñ AI-powered background removal: our BG remover extension applies artificial intelligence and delivers a perfect result within seconds. It precisely cuts the subject out of the background without leaving any unnecessary background areas.
üëå Easy-to-go interface: For the utmost convenience and the nicest experience, we design an intuitive layout. You can see a noticeable "Upload image" button. Click it and upload the photo you want to edit. 
üóù Time-saving solution: No more manual efforts. You don't need to painstakingly pick tiny pixels to ensure the clarity of the cutout outline. This background remover extension delivers impeccable removal results within seconds. 

Great for:
üìå E-commerce: This background remover extension serves as an efficient solution for e-commerce hosts. It offers access to batch background removal, which allows you to handle up to 50 images at one time.
üéó Personal use: Take some wonderful selfies with a cluttered background; you can use this tool to remove the background from the selfie and add a new background to make an amazing profile for social media platforms.
üéØ Graphic design: If you have a need for background removal when doing some graphic design, you can use this tool to previously remove the background in seconds.

üõ† How to use it?
‚ë† Click "Upload image" and select a photo you want to remove background from.
‚ë° The BG remover will automatically take the background out of the photo.
‚ë¢ Click the Download to get the final image with a transparent background.
